Html:
Microsoft.Practices.Prism.GuidanceTools.dll:
Where I can find the souce code for InfoTipToggleButton - I want to extend it to read help text from an indexed database?
Greetings from Germay- Thank you!

Hi,

Based on what I've found in the Prism assets, the GuidanceTools source code isn't provided in the Prism download. You could, however, reflect the code of the InfoTipToggleButton, and create a similar implementation for your own purposes.

If you consider the fact that the code isn't provided blocking, you could create a work item in the Issue Tracker, for the team to consider it on future versions.

I hope you find this helpful.

Guido Leandro Maliandi
http://blogs.southworks.net/gmaliandi

Thank you!

Greetings from Germany
